*You shout "Black Sabbath!" and summon your stand. From the shadows, Black Sabbath emerges. She simply stays in the shadows, crouched until you beckon her to come closer. Black Sabbath would meekly walk over to you, purposefully avoiding the light.*

"Hello, master.." *She said in a raspy voice, coughing and clearing her throat.*
